description: 1 x Oak (applicants ref. T1) - Remove lower branches growing towards/over footpath main road and building by up to approx 7metres. Reduce future hindrances with tall/high sided vehicles over roadside. Allow more light into bedding area and adjacent property. Branches do not form part of main crown (all lower trunk growth). 1 x Oak (applicants ref. T3) - Remove lower branches by up to approx 5metres. To allow future maintenance of surrounding bedding area and to reduce future growth over footpath and roadside. Allow more light into bedding area and adjacent property. Branches do not form part of main crown (all lower trunk growth). 1 x Oak (applicants ref. T4) - Remove lower branches by up to approx 4metres. To allow future maintenance of surrounding bedding area and to reduce future growth over footpath and roadside. Allow more light into bedding area and adjacent property. Branches do not form part of main crown (all lower trunk growth). 1 x Oak (applicants ref. T5) - Remove lower branches by up to approx 4metres. To allow future maintenance of surrounding bedding area and to reduce future growth over footpath and roadside. Allow more light into bedding area and adjacent property. Branches do not form part of main crown (all lower trunk growth). Note T3/T5 removal of any significant deadwood.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
